code: @Test public void testMmarshalPojo() throws Exception {     MockEndpoint mock = getMockEndpoint("mock:marshal").     mock.expectedMessageCount(1).     mock.message(0).body(String.class).isEqualTo("{\"name\":\"Camel\"}").     TestOtherPojo pojo = new TestOtherPojo().     pojo.setName("Camel").     pojo.setCountry(null).     template.sendBody("direct:marshal", pojo).     assertMockEndpointsSatisfied(). }

@Override public void configure() throws Exception {     JohnzonDataFormat format = new JohnzonDataFormat().     format.setSkipNull(true).     from("direct:marshal").marshal(format).to("mock:marshal"). }

@Override protected RouteBuilder createRouteBuilder() throws Exception {     return new RouteBuilder() {          @Override         public void configure() throws Exception {             JohnzonDataFormat format = new JohnzonDataFormat().             format.setSkipNull(true).             from("direct:marshal").marshal(format).to("mock:marshal").         }     }. }
